VERSION ALERT2: !!DO NOT USE CARAT ie: '^3.3.0' !! or else it will auto-update to unwanted version and not tell you
//a: This package.json is for running webpack server and also to build bundle*.js and provide yargs package to publish util for example
//b: It installs packages used by the project and also installs webpack command line and babel to do above
//c: It is NOT FOR PRODUCTION BUNDLE because production doesn't use webpack & babel.
//d: webpack & babel are command-line utilities used for development only.
//e: The node_modules here are used by stuff in subfolder webpack_babel. It doesnt have a node_modules
//f: and package.json because > 1 node_modules messes up React (error: more than 1 copy of react is running...)
